overview: "Dispatches Amidst" is a film that was made collaboratively, during lockdown. Filmmaker Lanie Zipoy asked friends living in different boroughs in New York City to record their urban environment. The film was inspired by Chantal Ackerman's aesthetic. It was part of the series Rhythms Routines Rituals at Theaterlab's reopening in May 2021.
title: Dispatches Amidst
